people.name: Jordan
people.intro: Hello and welcome to Mumbai! I'm Jordan, here to introduce you to the city's best-kept secrets and lively atmosphere

people.name: Alex
people.intro: Welcome to the enchanting city of Mumbai! I'm Alex, your guide, ready to unveil the hidden gems and vibrant culture of this unique destination

people.intro: Greetings from Mumbai! I'm Sam, excited to take you on a journey through the city's rich history and scenic beauty

people.name: Taylor
people.intro: Welcome to the magical city of Mumbai! I'm Taylor, your guide for today, eager to show you the charm and wonders of our city
